35#if HAVE_CONFIG_H
36#include "config.h"
37#endif
38#include <nbcompat.h>
39#if HAVE_SYS_CDEFS_H
40#include <sys/cdefs.h>
41#endif
42__RCSID("$NetBSD: automatic.c,v 1.2 2017/04/20 13:18:23 joerg Exp $");
43
44#if HAVE_ASSERT_H
45#include <assert.h>
46#endif
47#if HAVE_ERR_H
48#include <err.h>
49#endif
50#if HAVE_ERRNO_H
51#include <errno.h>
52#endif
53#if HAVE_FCNTL_H
54#include <fcntl.h>
55#endif
56#if HAVE_STRING_H
57#include <string.h>
58#endif
59#if HAVE_STDLIB_H
60#include <stdlib.h>
61#endif
62#if HAVE_SYS_STAT_H
63#include <sys/stat.h>
64#endif
65#include "lib.h"
66
67Boolean
68is_automatic_installed(const char *pkg)
69{
70 char *filename, *value;
71 Boolean ret;
72
73 assert(pkg[0] != '/');
74
75 filename = pkgdb_pkg_file(pkg, INSTALLED_INFO_FNAME);
76
77 value = var_get(filename, AUTOMATIC_VARNAME);
78
79 if (value && strcasecmp(value, "yes") == 0)
80 ret = TRUE;
81 else
82 ret = FALSE;
83
84 free(value);
85 free(filename);
86
87 return ret;
88}
89
90int
91mark_as_automatic_installed(const char *pkg, int value)
92{
93 char *filename;
94 int retval;
95
96 assert(pkg[0] != '/');
97
98 filename = pkgdb_pkg_file(pkg, INSTALLED_INFO_FNAME);
99
100 retval = var_set(filename, AUTOMATIC_VARNAME, value ? "yes" : NULL);
101
102 free(filename);
103
104 return retval;
105}
